title: Want to know repair status of my phone
content: Hi i sent my pixel 3a on 19th july 2020 its in warranty..its been already 15 days now still not sure whether my phone is repaired or not because i cant see any contact details of b2x service center..can i get a call back? or can i get b2x service center contact number? So i xan directly get in touch with themm..
